post_text: The crew is back together again and started Day 1 with a team building competition. Following breakfast, "The Salty Crew" boarded a bus headed for our local Walmart in Woodville. Six teams shopped for groceries to prepare a 3 course meal in a three hour time frame. The overall winning team in the Best Taste category was The Natural Born Grillers, and Best Presentation went to Slice, Slice Baby. Congratulations to our winners, and also to the other participants and staff for a great day back!! 😊
